ingredients: 12 lbs - Pale Malt, Maris Otter (Muntons) (3.0 SRM) (Grain)
1 lbs - Wyerman Chocolate Rye Malt (250.0 SRM) (Grain)
2.0 oz - Goldings, East Kent [7.2%] - Boil 20 min (Hops)
2.0 oz - Goldings, East Kent [7.2%] - Boil 5 min (Hops)
12.0 oz - Amber Maple Syrup [Boil for 5 min] (35.0 SRM) (Grain)
8.0 oz - Dememera Sugar [Boil for 5 min] (2.0 SRM) (Grain)
2.00 oz - Bourbon Soaked Toasted Oak Chips (Secondary 7 days) (Misc)
name: Little Shed Maple Bourbon Stout
